name: Elite Street Racers
description:
Elite Street Racers! A 2D Racing Game! See what high score you can get, unlock new cars, and just kill some time!

Game basics: You control a car from the 6 ones that are available with the 2 arrow keys to move right or left. If you hit another car you lose! Every time you reach +10 extra score your speed increases with 1! Good Luck!

Source Code can be found on Github here: https://github.com/LouisTheXIV/Elite-Street-Racers
